Richard held out a hand and replied simply, "If you'll build us a spaceport, we'll bring you a spaceline." And the rest is history.

Virgin Galactic's adventure began in 2005, and it was in that same year that our founder, @richardbranson, first met with Governor Bill Richardson. In this early exchange, Richardson said, "If you'll bring us a spaceline, we'll build you a spaceport."

We extend our sincere condolences on the passing of former New Mexico Governor Bill Richardson, and our gratitude for his visionary support of Virgin Galactic in New Mexico. Thank you, Bill.

Richard held out a hand and replied simply, "If you'll build us a spaceport, we'll bring you a spaceline." And the rest is history.

Virgin Galactic's adventure began in 2005, and it was in that same year that our founder, @richardbranson, first met with Governor Bill Richardson. In this early exchange, Richardson said, "If you'll bring us a spaceline, we'll build you a spaceport."

We extend our sincere condolences on the passing of former New Mexico Governor Bill Richardson, and our gratitude for his visionary support of Virgin Galactic in New Mexico. Thank you, Bill.

Richard held out a hand and replied simply, "If you'll build us a spaceport, we'll bring you a spaceline." And the rest is history.

Virgin Galactic's adventure began in 2005, and it was in that same year that our founder, @richardbranson, first met with Governor Bill Richardson. In this early exchange, Richardson said, "If you'll bring us a spaceline, we'll build you a spaceport."

We extend our sincere condolences on the passing of former New Mexico Governor Bill Richardson, and our gratitude for his visionary support of Virgin Galactic in New Mexico. Thank you, Bill.

Richard held out a hand and replied simply, "If you'll build us a spaceport, we'll bring you a spaceline." And the rest is history.

Virgin Galactic's adventure began in 2005, and it was in that same year that our founder, @richardbranson, first met with Governor Bill Richardson. In this early exchange, Richardson said, "If you'll bring us a spaceline, we'll build you a spaceport."

Richard held out a hand and replied simply, "If you'll build us a spaceport, we'll bring you a spaceline." And the rest is history.

Virgin Galactic's adventure began in 2005, and it was in that same year that our founder, @richardbranson, first met with Governor Bill Richardson. In this early exchange, Richardson said, "If you'll bring us a spaceline, we'll build you a spaceport."

We extend our sincere condolences on the passing of former New Mexico Governor Bill Richardson, and our gratitude for his visionary support of Virgin Galactic in New Mexico. Thank you, Bill.

Richard held out a hand and replied simply, "If you'll build us a spaceport, we'll bring you a spaceline." And the rest is history.

Virgin Galactic's adventure began in 2005, and it was in that same year that our founder, @richardbranson, first met with Governor Bill Richardson. In this early exchange, Richardson said, "If you'll bring us a spaceline, we'll build you a spaceport."

We extend our sincere condolences on the passing of former New Mexico Governor Bill Richardson, and our gratitude for his visionary support of Virgin Galactic in New Mexico. Thank you, Bill.

Richard held out a hand and replied simply, "If you'll build us a spaceport, we'll bring you a spaceline." And the rest is history.

Virgin Galactic's adventure began in 2005, and it was in that same year that our founder, @richardbranson, first met with Governor Bill Richardson. In this early exchange, Richardson said, "If you'll bring us a spaceline, we'll build you a spaceport."

We extend our sincere condolences on the passing of former New Mexico Governor Bill Richardson, and our gratitude for his visionary support of Virgin Galactic in New Mexico. Thank you, Bill.

Richard held out a hand and replied simply, "If you'll build us a spaceport, we'll bring you a spaceline." And the rest is history.

Virgin Galactic's adventure began in 2005, and it was in that same year that our founder, @richardbranson, first met with Governor Bill Richardson. In this early exchange, Richardson said, "If you'll bring us a spaceline, we'll build you a spaceport."

We extend our sincere condolences on the passing of former New Mexico Governor Bill Richardson, and our gratitude for his visionary support of Virgin Galactic in New Mexico. Thank you, Bill.

Richard held out a hand and replied simply, "If you'll build us a spaceport, we'll bring you a spaceline." And the rest is history.

Virgin Galactic's adventure began in 2005, and it was in that same year that our founder, @richardbranson, first met with Governor Bill Richardson. In this early exchange, Richardson said, "If you'll bring us a spaceline, we'll build you a spaceport."

Richard held out a hand and replied simply, "If you'll build us a spaceport, we'll bring you a spaceline." And the rest is history.

Virgin Galactic's adventure began in 2005, and it was in that same year that our founder, @richardbranson, first met with Governor Bill Richardson. In this early exchange, Richardson said, "If you'll bring us a spaceline, we'll build you a spaceport."

We extend our sincere condolences on the passing of former New Mexico Governor Bill Richardson, and our gratitude for his visionary support of Virgin Galactic in New Mexico. Thank you, Bill.

Richard held out a hand and replied simply, "If you'll build us a spaceport, we'll bring you a spaceline." And the rest is history.

Virgin Galactic's adventure began in 2005, and it was in that same year that our founder, @richardbranson, first met with Governor Bill Richardson. In this early exchange, Richardson said, "If you'll bring us a spaceline, we'll build you a spaceport."

We extend our sincere condolences on the passing of former New Mexico Governor Bill Richardson, and our gratitude for his visionary support of Virgin Galactic in New Mexico. Thank you, Bill.

Richard held out a hand and replied simply, "If you'll build us a spaceport, we'll bring you a spaceline." And the rest is history.

Virgin Galactic's adventure began in 2005, and it was in that same year that our founder, @richardbranson, first met with Governor Bill Richardson. In this early exchange, Richardson said, "If you'll bring us a spaceline, we'll build you a spaceport."

We extend our sincere condolences on the passing of former New Mexico Governor Bill Richardson, and our gratitude for his visionary support of Virgin Galactic in New Mexico. Thank you, Bill.

Richard held out a hand and replied simply, "If you'll build us a spaceport, we'll bring you a spaceline." And the rest is history.

Virgin Galactic's adventure began in 2005, and it was in that same year that our founder, @richardbranson, first met with Governor Bill Richardson. In this early exchange, Richardson said, "If you'll bring us a spaceline, we'll build you a spaceport."

We extend our sincere condolences on the passing of former New Mexico Governor Bill Richardson, and our gratitude for his visionary support of Virgin Galactic in New Mexico. Thank you, Bill.

Richard held out a hand and replied simply, "If you'll build us a spaceport, we'll bring you a spaceline." And the rest is history.

Virgin Galactic's adventure began in 2005, and it was in that same year that our founder, @richardbranson, first met with Governor Bill Richardson. In this early exchange, Richardson said, "If you'll bring us a spaceline, we'll build you a spaceport."

Richard held out a hand and replied simply, "If you'll build us a spaceport, we'll bring you a spaceline." And the rest is history.

Virgin Galactic's adventure began in 2005, and it was in that same year that our founder, @richardbranson, first met with Governor Bill Richardson. In this early exchange, Richardson said, "If you'll bring us a spaceline, we'll build you a spaceport."

We extend our sincere condolences on the passing of former New Mexico Governor Bill Richardson, and our gratitude for his visionary support of Virgin Galactic in New Mexico. Thank you, Bill.

Richard held out a hand and replied simply, "If you'll build us a spaceport, we'll bring you a spaceline." And the rest is history.

Virgin Galactic's adventure began in 2005, and it was in that same year that our founder, @richardbranson, first met with Governor Bill Richardson. In this early exchange, Richardson said, "If you'll bring us a spaceline, we'll build you a spaceport."

We extend our sincere condolences on the passing of former New Mexico Governor Bill Richardson, and our gratitude for his visionary support of Virgin Galactic in New Mexico. Thank you, Bill.

Richard held out a hand and replied simply, "If you'll build us a spaceport, we'll bring you a spaceline." And the rest is history.

Virgin Galactic's adventure began in 2005, and it was in that same year that our founder, @richardbranson, first met with Governor Bill Richardson. In this early exchange, Richardson said, "If you'll bring us a spaceline, we'll build you a spaceport."

We extend our sincere condolences on the passing of former New Mexico Governor Bill Richardson, and our gratitude for his visionary support of Virgin Galactic in New Mexico. Thank you, Bill.

Richard held out a hand and replied simply, "If you'll build us a spaceport, we'll bring you a spaceline." And the rest is history.

Virgin Galactic's adventure began in 2005, and it was in that same year that our founder, @richardbranson, first met with Governor Bill Richardson. In this early exchange, Richardson said, "If you'll bring us a spaceline, we'll build you a spaceport."

We extend our sincere condolences on the passing of former New Mexico Governor Bill Richardson, and our gratitude for his visionary support of Virgin Galactic in New Mexico. Thank you, Bill.

Richard held out a hand and replied simply, "If you'll build us a spaceport, we'll bring you a spaceline." And the rest is history.

Virgin Galactic's adventure began in 2005, and it was in that same year that our founder, @richardbranson, first met with Governor Bill Richardson. In this early exchange, Richardson said, "If you'll bring us a spaceline, we'll build you a spaceport."

Richard held out a hand and replied simply, "If you'll build us a spaceport, we'll bring you a spaceline." And the rest is history.

Virgin Galactic's adventure began in 2005, and it was in that same year that our founder, @richardbranson, first met with Governor Bill Richardson. In this early exchange, Richardson said, "If you'll bring us a spaceline, we'll build you a spaceport."

We extend our sincere condolences on the passing of former New Mexico Governor Bill Richardson, and our gratitude for his visionary support of Virgin Galactic in New Mexico. Thank you, Bill.

Richard held out a hand and replied simply, "If you'll build us a spaceport, we'll bring you a spaceline." And the rest is history.

Virgin Galactic's adventure began in 2005, and it was in that same year that our founder, @richardbranson, first met with Governor Bill Richardson. In this early exchange, Richardson said, "If you'll bring us a spaceline, we'll build you a spaceport."

We extend our sincere condolences on the passing of former New Mexico Governor Bill Richardson, and our gratitude for his visionary support of Virgin Galactic in New Mexico. Thank you, Bill.

Richard held out a hand and replied simply, "If you'll build us a spaceport, we'll bring you a spaceline." And the rest is history.

Virgin Galactic's adventure began in 2005, and it was in that same year that our founder, @richardbranson, first met with Governor Bill Richardson. In this early exchange, Richardson said, "If you'll bring us a spaceline, we'll build you a spaceport."

We extend our sincere condolences on the passing of former New Mexico Governor Bill Richardson, and our gratitude for his visionary support of Virgin Galactic in New Mexico. Thank you, Bill.

Richard held out a hand and replied simply, "If you'll build us a spaceport, we'll bring you a spaceline." And the rest is history.

Virgin Galactic's adventure began in 2005, and it was in that same year that our founder, @richardbranson, first met with Governor Bill Richardson. In this early exchange, Richardson said, "If you'll bring us a spaceline, we'll build you a spaceport."

We extend our sincere condolences on the passing of former New Mexico Governor Bill Richardson, and our gratitude for his visionary support of Virgin Galactic in New Mexico. Thank you, Bill.
